trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of action that is expected

Levels.new_bloc_left_hand: a block in which left hand movement is required is about to start
Levels.new_bloc_tongue: a block in which tongue movement is required is about to start

nbloc.Description: Progressive number of the block performed (max 0:22)

onset.Description: Onset of the stimulus in ms

duration.Description: duration of the stimulus in ms
